content:
{
 "terminal.integrated.defaultProfile.linux": "bash",
 "python.experiments.enabled": false,
 "python.venvPath": "/opt/dataiku/python-code-envs",
 "python.venvFolders": ["/opt/dataiku/py37-dss","/opt/dataiku/pyenv","/opt/dataiku/python-code-envs"],
 "python.defaultInterpreterPath": "/opt/dataiku/py37-dss/bin/python",
 "launch": {
    "version": "0.2.0",
    "configurations": [
        {
            "name": "Python 3.7 + dku APIs",
            "type": "python",
            "python": "/opt/dataiku/py37-dss/bin/python",
            "request": "launch",
            "program": "${file}",
            "console": "integratedTerminal"
        },
        {
            "name": "Python 3.6 + dku APIs",
            "type": "python",
            "python": "/opt/dataiku/pyenv/bin/python",
            "request": "launch",
            "program": "${file}",
            "console": "integratedTerminal"
        },
        {
            "name": "Python: Current Interpreter",
            "type": "python",
            "request": "launch",
            "program": "${file}",
            "console": "integratedTerminal"
        }
        ,
        {
            "name": "pyenv-streamlit",
            "type": "python",
            "python": "/opt/dataiku/python-code-envs/pyenv-streamlit/bin/python",
            "request": "launch",
            "program": "${file}",
            "console": "integratedTerminal"
        }
        ]
    }
}
